name: IU Kokomo
description: Indiana University Northwest (IUN); Indiana University Kokomo (IUK); Indiana University South Bend (IUSB)

name: Pervasive Technology Institute
description: PTI is a collaborative organization of seven research, development, and delivery centers.  Among the seven, there are ties to:  IU Schools (College of Arts and Sciences; Maurer School of Law; School of Engineering, IUPUI; School of Informatics, Computing, and Engineering; School of Medicine; School of Science, IU Kokomo) and two IU Administrative responsibility centers (IU Bloomington Libraries, Office of the VP for Information Technologies)

name: Human Resources Office
description: The UITS Human Resources Office works to develop strategies, programs, and services to ensure the availability of highly motivated, well-trained, and results-oriented technology support professionals.

members.title: Executive Director, Media Digitization and Preservation Initiative

name: User Experience Office
description: The User Experience Office (UXO) takes a holistic approach to create simple, inclusive digital experiences. The UXO collaborates with university partners to help apply principles and best practices to their projects.

name: Institutional Assurance
description: Institutional Assurance seeks to protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data and delivery systems across the university.

members.title: Acting Chief Assurance Officer, and Executive Director and Chief Information Security Officer OmniSOC

name: Financial Planning, Budget Administration and Accounting
description: The Finance Office (FO) provides financial management and support for all units within UITS.  Comprehensive services include budgeting and associated guidance/oversight, financial analysis and reporting, payroll, accounts payable/capital assets, and accounts receivable.
